data.title: SAP America, Inc.
data.text:
Resource Guides

Company Overview:

SAP: 33 Years in the Business of Helping Businesses Grow

Founded in 1972, SAP is the recognized leader in providing collaborative business solutions for all types of industries and for every major market.

SAP addresses the needs of grocery retailers through the integration of business processes for merchandise management and planning, demand forecasting, sophisticated allocation, workforce management, POS data management, RFID, and replenishment. For more information, visit www.sap.com/usa/retail.

Product Description:

Our Solutions Enable Grocery Retailers To Transform Their Business

SAP for Retail provides a set of comprehensive solutions designed to help you get closer to your customers, and refine and deliver localized, profitable, yet competitive assortments within a flexible and efficient demand-driven network. Combining supply chain logic with customer relationship management, SAP solutions help you do it all:

n Store And Channel Management

• Industry-leading point of sale solution

• ARTS (Association for Retail Technology Standards)-based POS

integration and POS data management

• Customer relationship management

• Workforce management and store operations

n Category/Merchandise Management

• Customer demand intelligence

• Category management

• Assortment planning and new product introduction

• Promotions and allocations

n Retail Revenue Management

• Price optimization and execution to store level

• Vendor deals, costs, margins, and rebates

• Clearance management

n Supply Chain Management

• Industry-leading store forecasting and replenishment

• Support for vendor collaboration

• Warehouse and transportation management

• Supplier relationship management and vendor evaluation

• Private label management

n Operations

• Master data management

• Robust transaction processing

• Integration with finance and human resources
